English: Is that it? Not much of a challenge.
Korean: ……고작 이 정도인가. 흥, 별 볼 일 없군
German: Das war’s? Nicht gerade eine Herausforderung.

English:
When you asked me for help, I thought I was in for
some fun, but that was a disappointment.
Chinese:
是你說要我幫忙的，我還以為能好好玩一下，
真是太讓我失望了。
Korean:
인간에게 사육되는 디지몬은
평범한 디지몬보다 강하다고 들었는데 별거 아니군
German:
Als du mich um Hilfe gebeten hast, dachte ich,
das wird ein Spaß, aber es war sehr enttäuschend.

English:
Although...I'm sure your Digimon would make worthy
opponents.
Chinese:
不過……如果是你的數碼寶貝，
應該就能讓我開心一下吧。
Korean:
아니……소문대로 강한 놈도 있었지.
네 디지몬이라면 조금은 즐길 수 있겠지
German:
Wobei das nicht auf alle zutrifft. Ich bin sicher,
deine Digimon wären würdige Gegner.

English:
Of course they still wouldn't stand a chance
against me.
Chinese:
但還是不夠格，
不足以讓我認真應戰啊。
Korean:
하지만 그래도 아직
진심인 날 상대하기엔 못 미치겠지만
German:
Aber natürlich hätten sie trotzdem keine Chance
gegen mich.

English:
I'll soon get bored of easy fights like this.
Hurry up and get stronger.
Chinese:
都是這種程度的戰鬥，實在是無聊到受不了。
趕快給我變強吧。
Korean:
이런 싸움만 하다간 심심해서 못 견디겠다.
얼른 강해져라
German:
Bald werden mir solche leichten Kämpfe
langweilig. Beeil dich damit, stärker zu werden.

English:
Then help me train.
I'll do my best.
It will take time. Rome wasn't built in a day.
Chinese:
那麼就陪我一起特訓啊
我會努力的，希望你可以看著
沒辦法立刻變得那麼強啦
Korean:
그럼 특훈을 도와줘
열심히 할 테니까 지켜봐 줬으면 좋겠어
그렇게 금방 강해질 수는 없어
German:
Dann hilf mir zu trainieren.
Ich werde mein Bestes tun.
Das dauert. Rom wurde nicht an einem Tag erbaut.

English:
I don't owe you enough to give you that much help.
Just fight more and get stronger.
Chinese:
我欠你的人情，應該不到得幫忙到那種程度吧。
自己去戰鬥，自己去變強吧。
Korean:
그렇게까지 도와줘야 할 정도로 빚을 지진 않았을 텐데.
멋대로 싸워서 멋대로 강해져라
German:
Ich schulde dir nicht genug, um dir so einen
großen Gefallen zu tun. Kämpfe einfach öfter,
um stärker zu werden.

English:
But I might give you some pointers if I'm ever in
the mood.
Chinese:
……哼。等我有意時，
開個口給個建議也行。
Korean: ……흥. 뭐, 기분이 내키면 말참견 정도는 해주마
German:
Aber ich gebe dir vielleicht ein paar Tipps, wenn
mir danach ist.

English:
You'll do your best? Hmph, that's what people say
when they know they aren't good enough.
Chinese: 會努力？　哼，還真會說這種天真的話啊。
Korean: 열심히 하겠다고? 흥, 유치한 소리나 지껄이는 놈이군
German:
Du wirst dein Bestes tun? Hmpf, so was sagen die
Leute, wenn sie wissen, dass es nicht reichen
wird.

English: Very well, I'll see what your "best" is.
Chinese:
……那好啊，
就讓我看看你那口中的“努力”吧。
German:
Na schön, ich werde ja sehen, was „dein
Bestes“ ist.

English: It could be interesting to watch you struggle.
Chinese: 但那也得要你掙扎的模樣，有值得觀賞的價值在啊。
Korean: 네가 발악하는 모습에 볼만한 가치가 있다면 말이지
German:
Es könnte interessant werden, zuzusehen, wie du
dich abmühst.

English:
Hmph, you're honest, and what you say is true.
However...
Chinese:
哼，還真是誠實的傢伙。
說的話雖然是對的――
Korean:
흥, 솔직한 놈이군.
하는 말은 지극히 옳은 소리지만――
German:
Hmpf, du bist ehrlich, und was du sagst, stimmt.
Aber ...

English:
That's not what I want to hear, and you don't want
to displease me.
Chinese:
……真是讓人不爽。
勸你別讓我的心情變糟啊。
Korean:
……마음에 안 들어.
너, 내 비위를 너무 거스르지 않는 게 좋을 거다
German:
Das ist nicht, was ich hören will, und du
solltest mich nicht verstimmen.

English:
You can have this. Throw it away if you don't
want it.
Chinese:
喂，給你這東西。
……不需要的話就丟掉吧。
German:
Du kannst das hier haben. Wirf es weg, falls du es
nicht willst.

English:
I promised I'd help you. If you need me again,
I'll lend a hand.
Chinese:
我答應過會幫助你了。
如果還需要我的力量，我就來幫你。
Korean:
손을 빌려주겠다고 약속해버렸으니
또 내 힘을 빌리고 싶다면 도와주마
German:
Ich habe versprochen, dir zu helfen. Wenn du mich
wieder brauchen solltest, werde ich dir unter die
Arme greifen.

English: As much as you annoy me, I'll be there. Goodbye.
Chinese:
就讓我瞧瞧，你究竟會是什麼樣的傢伙吧。
那麼再見了。
Korean:
네가 어느 정도의 녀석인지 옆에서 구경하도록 하지.
그럼 나중에 보자
German:
So lästig ich dich auch finden mag, ich werde da
sein. Leb wohl.
